creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com
text:
By using a script, if you try to remove all elements from the <svg> root, then 
the repaint is not done, because the bounding box of the <svg> element
(CanvasGraphicsNode) becomes null. The renderer stops. Event if the dirty 
rectangles looks correct to me, those are not blanked since there is nothing to 
render anymore.
